article_title: Trump Explains His Health Care Plan: "In Obamacare, You Pay For Things You Never Use"
article_text:
'On the Record' Town Hall with Donald Trump: GOP presidential front-runner vows to replace ObamaCare with 'something so much less expensive and so much better' that will cost much less money and will be available to anyone who wants it.





DONALD TRUMP: Whoever wants it is going to have it, whoever wants it... I said nobody is dying on the street if I am president. And the Republicans said, oh, that's terrible.



When people can't afford it, we are going to help them out, we have got to.
